name: Aipi The Little Fire
description:
Description

Aipi the little fire is game jam product for ludum dare 44. The theme of ludum dare is "Your Life is currency".  So we made a concept about little candle fire that have soul / life. The Fire Soul of Aipi can aspect multiple values of the game like damage and can be used for upgrade power.

Character

The Little Candle Fire that life in Kingdom of Fire.
Main mobs in "Aipi The Little Fire"

Control

KeyFunctionWMove UpAMove LeftSMove DownDMove RightQChange Weapon 1EChange Weapon 2 Left ClickShoot / AttackPointerRotate Target Attack

Objective

Objective of this game is to kill enemy until no one left.

Trivia

  1. This game character is from our future project which is use character name "Aipi"
  2. Aipi is from Bahasa Indonesia "Api" means Fire.
